name: Get above the weather
description:
Get above the weather is a game about a boy who always hated the rain, and he always told himself, he would one day get above the weather. On one thundering night he set off... Controls

  • A - Move left
  • D - Move Right
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Escape - Pause menu toggle
Features to be implemented

Here's the list in no particular order:

  • An enemy of some kind (other than falling)
  • More levels (or extending the current one, who knows?)
  • Points to incentivize you to go faster!
  • Making the story more present
  • Tutorial Level
Next steps

My next steps are going to be to make the game better in terms of general playability, and overall enjoyment of the game.
